As a Quality Assurance (QA) professional at Augmont Goldtech Pvt Ltd, you will play a crucial role in ensuring the quality and reliability of our products/services. You will be responsible for evaluating and testing our products/services to identify and resolve any issues, ensuring they meet the highest quality standards. This role requires a meticulous approach, strong analytical skills, and a passion for delivering excellence.


Responsibilities:

  • Test Planning: Collaborate with cross-functional teams to develop comprehensive test plans, test cases, and test scripts to ensure thorough testing of our products/services and the coverage.
  • Test Execution: Execute manual and automated test cases, document test results, and provide clear and concise feedback to the development team.
  • Test Skill set: Manual Testing / Exploratory Testing / Database Testing/ API Testing/ MS SQL
  • Defect Identification: Identify, document, and track defects using designated tools. Work closely with developers to prioritise and resolve issues in a timely manner.
  • Regression Testing: Perform regression testing to ensure that previously identified issues have been resolved and that new changes have not introduced new defects.
  • Test Automation: Contribute to the development and maintenance of automated test scripts to increase efficiency and test coverage.
  • Quality Assurance Documentation: Maintain detailed test documentation, including test plans, test cases, and bug reports.
  • Continuous Improvement: Proactively identify opportunities to improve the QA process and advocate for best practices within the team.
  • Collaboration: Collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams, including developers, product managers, and business analysts, to ensure quality standards are met.
  • Quality Metrics: Monitor and report on key quality metrics, providing insights into product quality and areas for improvement.


Requirements:

  • Bachelor's degree in relevant field or equivalent work experience.
  • Proven experience in quality assurance/testing roles.
  • Strong knowledge of QA methodologies, tools, and processes.
  • Experience with test automation tools (e. g., Selenium, JUnit) is a plus.
  • Skilled in debugging techniques to quickly identify root cause of defects within applications and their dependencies.
  • Strong communication and interpersonal skills.
  • Attention to detail and a commitment to delivering high-quality work.
  • Ability to work independently and as part of a collaborative team.
  • Knowledge of Banking and loan domain is a plus.
  • Ability to quickly understand complex business problems
  • Well-versed in all testing methodologies
  • Proactively monitor customer insights and production issues to seek quality feedback and improve processes to enhance quality of the product/capability
